features.featureTitle: Update ONLY the selected image element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) in `frontend/src/components/sections/CustomCarpetsCtaSection.tsx` so it visually behaves like a cover image that stretches across the entire viewport width (no side margins) and has sharp (non-rounded) edges.
